title: Ep 3: If You Masked Me To with Lauren Adams
itunes:title: Ep 3: If You Masked Me To with Lauren Adams
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree talk to Lauren Adams — one of the stars of Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt and proprietress of the Masking for Trouble Instagram — all about her favorite face masks. Kate also discusses why she loves her French dry oil and Doree explains why s...
description:
Kate and Doree talk to Lauren Adams — one of the stars of Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt and proprietress of the Masking for Trouble Instagram — all about her favorite face masks. Kate also discusses why she loves her French dry oil and Doree explains why she decided to do Whole30 in January!

For a list of all the products mentioned on this episode, visit www.forever35podcast.com. Follow the podcast on Instagram @forever35podcast and on Twitter at @forever35pod, and join the Forever35 Facebook group at www.facebook.com/groups/forever35podcast. You can email Kate and Doree at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
